text: O manavulara! Oka udaharana ivvabadutondi, danini srad'dhaga vinandi! Niscayanga, miru allah nu vadili evarinaite prarthistunnaro, varanta kalisi okka iganu kuda srstincaleru. Mariyu okavela, a iga vari nundi emaina lakkoni poyina, varu danini, dani (a iga) nundi vidipincukonu leru. Enta balahinulu, i arthincevaru mariyu arthincabadevaru
